attributes.additional_details:
Stop the Cuts Save our pool!
Join us in our fight to save the Afan Valley. Let's protect the Children of today and give them a better tomorrow.
The closure of our pool will have a detrimental effect on our community. There has been a swimming pool in this Valley since 1938. Let's stand together , stand strong and fight for what we deserve !

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local Council. You may wish to contact your MP also to further your campaign.
